result.arabic_text: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَيُدۡخِلُهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
result.translation: 30. Tokkel yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abe marah tu-gactek, ken Rabbi isi jannat ken culsa isi racmatah woo culim usuk baxxaqqa-le affaafa (limaya).
